alert.note: Alert for Newcastle; Northeastern Crook; Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Western Crook; Weston County Plains; Wyoming Black Hills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 12 at 9:31PM MST until January 15 at 11:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 45 to 60 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of northwestern, southwestern and the Black Hills of South Dakota and northeast and the Black Hills of Wyoming. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Cheyenne River Reservation. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes. Travel may be hazardous at times due to blowing snow.
info.instruction: A Wind Chill Warning means the combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. Even if you are outdoors for just a few minutes, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands.

area.areaDesc: Newcastle; Northeastern Crook; Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Western Crook; Weston County Plains; Wyoming Black Hills
